sense.def:
To lag behind someone or something
pomeni premikati se ali napredovati počasneje kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: He set off at a brisk walk, Kate lagging behind.
Britain's economic development must lag behind that of almost every other industrial nation.

sense.def:
Kadar trgovanje ali naložbe
lag
, jih je veliko manj kot prej.

A time lag
je obdobje med dvema povezanima dogodkoma.

seg.quote: There will be a one-year lag between the time I write this book and its publication.

sense.def:
To lag a pipe, a water tank, or the inside of a roof
pomeni pokriti cev, vodni rezervoar ali notranji del strehe s posebnim materialom, da toplota ne more ven.
